nodes.text: Hired Guns is a scenario for the Star Wars Miniatures game, by Sterling Hershey in 2005. It depicts a battle between the vicious Blackstar Raiders and a group of mercenaries hired to eliminate them.

The Blackstar Raiders have terrorized planets for months. Anticipating the raid, Medara's Outpost has hired mercenary protection. The Raiders cleverly insert a small force and a spy to find the depot, but has revealed himself to the guards.
A fight ensues as the Raiders attempt to steal components from the depot.
